global.ActivateLivestreamDesc1: PLEASE NOTE: Livestream is an add-on and costs 1,60 DKK per connection (viewers + teacher) per hour (60 minutes). A class at 60 minutes with 10 participants will therefore cost 17,60 DKK. Customers that are signed up but don't watch the class cost nothing.

global.NoShowFeesExplanation1: No-show fees are applied when the customer cancels a booking later than the cancellation deadline or applied by the system the day after the class, if the customer is not checked in. The studio has the rest of the day to correct any mistakes in registration and check-in, and then after midnight, no-show fees for the past day are applied.
global.NoShowFeesExplanation2: For memberships, the fees will be charged with the next automatic membership payment. For time-based class passes, one or more days are deducted from the class pass. For class passes with a fixed number of classes, the class is simply not returned to the class pass.
global.NoShowFeesActivationWarningBody: Do you want to enable no-show fees? Any registrations for classes yesterday, where the customer is not checked in, will get a fee applied right away.

global.videoLimitDesc1: To allow your customers to access a video through YOGO memberships, class passes, and courses, the video must be restricted to YOGO so that it cannot be seen anywhere else. Specifically, YOGO sets your video to NOT be viewable on vimeo.com itself, and only to be embedded on your website and in YOGO.
global.videoLimitDesc2: NOTE: If you have uploaded a new video that you want to use on YOGO, it is a good idea to limit it to YOGO right away. Otherwise, you risk that it is suggested to a customer when another video ends, and the customer will then be able to watch it for free.
global.videoLimitDesc3: You can change settings on your Vimeo account so that it does not automatically suggest other videos when a video ends.
global.weHaveSentEmail: We have sent you an email with instructions to reset your password
global.youCanNowSignup: You can now log in with your new password

global.EditVimeoWebsiteDomainText2: This will prevent people from watching them without buying access.
global.EditVimeoWebsiteDomainText3: If you want to change the website later, please contact YOGO.

payment.CountrySelectorIfAnyQuestions: If you have any questions, don't hesitate to get in touch by phone, email or chat.
payment.PaymentSetupStripeMsg1: To receive payments you will need to provide a few details about yourself/your company to our payment partner Stripe.
payment.PaymentSetupStripeMsg2: This is a very smooth process and afterwards you will be able to sell membership, class passes, etc.
